conversation.content: I got this notice. Class action. You probably sent thousands out wrong.
Oh! Oh! A settlement notice, yes yes yes, let me—let me pull that right up for you. What's the case number on the notice you received? Should be like CAL-2024 something?
CAL-2024-889TX. My attorney says I should've heard months ago.

CAL-2024-889TX, perfect perfect. Okay so—so this is actually really interesting, this is the data breach settlement from last year, and um, you're showing as eligible for tier 2 compensation which is $147.50!
Tier 2? That's it? I think there's been some mistake here.
Hmm, let me—let me dig deeper into this. Your account shows... oh wait wait wait, I see what's happening! You actually have TWO claims, the second one is pending review under reference SR-90412-B.
Two claims. Right. So what's the holdup exactly?
So the the second claim, it needs identity verification, just—just standard procedure but I can actually handle that right now if you have like thirty seconds?
Fine. But this better not take long. I've got calls.
Absolutely absolutely! Super quick, I promise. Can you verify the last four of your social? Just need to match it to what's in claim SR-90412-B.
7829. This is probably why everything's delayed, your system.
7829, yep yep that matches! Oh this is—this is great actually, your second claim qualifies for tier 1, which is $450.00, so combined you're looking at $597.50 total!
Oh. Well. That's... that's sort of more reasonable I guess.

Right? Right? And here's the—here's the really good news, both payments can be expedited! Instead of waiting 60-90 days, we can process them together with code FASTTRACK-2X and you'll have them in 10 business days.
Ten days. Okay. But if this doesn't arrive, I'm calling legal.

Totally totally understand! I'm—I'm putting a priority flag on both claims right now, reference numbers PY-88291-A and PY-88291-B, and honestly our settlement team is really good about these expedited ones.
Fine. Send confirmation to my email. The premium account one.
Of course of course! Sending to the email ending in @platinumexec.net, correct? Should hit your inbox in—in about two minutes with all the the details and tracking info.
Good. Next time maybe send the right notice first try.

Absolutely, I—I hear you on that. Oh! Before you go though, I just noticed your account qualifies for our settlement alert service, basically basically any future settlements you're eligible for get flagged immediately, want me to—to activate that real quick?

scenario: asking about a class action settlement they received notice for
